title: Session Notes Formatter
description: Convert rough session notes into structured CRM documentation.

body.content: Format my SBDC client session notes for our CRM system.

body.label: Client First Name
body.tip: Client's first name only — protect PII

body.label: Session Notes
body.placeholder: Paste your rough notes from the session here — shorthand, bullet points, stream of consciousness all fine...

body.content:
Please organize these raw session notes into the following structured format for CRM entry:

1. Session Summary (2-3 concise sentences)
2. Topics Discussed (bullet points)
3. Advice & Recommendations Given (what you advised)
4. Action Items for Client (with suggested deadlines)
5. Follow-up Items for Advisor (your to-dos)
6. Next Session Focus Areas
7. Milestones to Track (any measurable outcomes to watch)

Keep language professional but concise. Optimize for database entry — no filler words.
